argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pclun2.s | |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pclun2.p | |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pclun2.c | |- U = ( PCl ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> K e. HL ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Atoms ` K ) = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_psubssat | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S ) -> X C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> X C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 1 | #P_psubssat | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ Y e. S ) -> Y C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> Y C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 2, 3 | #P_pclunN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ ( Atoms ` K ) /\ Y C_ ( Atoms ` K ) ) -> ( U ` ( X u. Y ) ) = ( U ` ( X .+ Y ) ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 7, 9, 10 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( U ` ( X u. Y ) ) = ( U ` ( X .+ Y ) ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2 | #P_paddclN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. S ) |
| 13 | 1, 3 | #P_pclidN | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X .+ Y ) e. S ) -> ( U ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( X .+ Y ) ) |
| 14 | 4, 12, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( U ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( X .+ Y ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. S /\ Y e. S ) -> ( U ` ( X u. Y ) ) = ( X .+ Y ) ) |
